name: Scorecard
tagline: Evaluate, Optimize, and Ship AI Agents
description: For teams building AI in high-stakes domains, Scorecard combines LLM evals, human feedback, and product signals to help agents learn and improve automatically, so that you can evaluate, optimize, and ship confidently.

name: Nora
tagline: The AI coding agent for building secure Web3 apps
description: Cursor, Claude, and all the other coding agents weren't built for web3 and can't be trusted for writing smart contracts or deploying securely to blockchains. Nora was purpose-built so you can write, test, and deploy secure dApps with confidence.

name: Claude Haiku 4.5
tagline: The fastest, most affordable coding model
description: Anthropic just unveiled Claude Haiku 4.5, its fastest and most efficient small model yet. Haiku 4.5 matches the coding performance of Claude Sonnet 4, once a frontier model, but now runs 2x faster and costs one-third as much. I

name: Monocle 2.0 for macOS
tagline: Noise-cancelling for your screen
description: A sleek, minimalist menu-bar app that elegantly blurs everything but your active window, giving you the focus you need. The 2.0 update introduces a smooth window-to-window transition, along with other improvements and new features.

name: Genspark Custom Super Agent
tagline: Create your own AI agent with just one prompt
description: YOUR own AI agent with a single prompt! No coding required! What you can do: -Build your agent in minutes: just describe what you want with one simple prompt -Reuse it effortlessly: chat directly or @ mention in Genspark -Share your agent in our Agent Store

name: Zed for Windows
tagline: Ultra‑native Windows editor with WSL, extensions, and AI
description: Next-gen code editor built for speed & modern workflows. Now on Windows with WSL support, DirectX 11, extensions, AI features. Designed for teams. Built in the open. Free download—try it now.

name: HuggingChat
tagline: The smart router for open-source models
description: HuggingChat is back, now powered by Omni. It's a smart chat interface that automatically routes your prompt to the best open-source model for the job, selecting from over 115 models across 15 providers.

name: file renamer ai
tagline: rename 100 files in under 2 minutes
description: Rename videos, photos, audio, pdfs with AI. Smart, automatic organization. Batch rename thousands of files in under 2-3 minutes for extremely cheap. (1000 renames for $10)

name: Any2K: Anything to Kindle
tagline: Curate, read & listen to your content anywhere & Kindle too!
description: Any2K is your personalized content library. Save articles, newsletters and more from across the web, and enjoy them on your Kindle or mobile devices at your own pace, with a clean interface or text2speech. Available on every major desktop and mobile platform.

name: Signal Station
tagline: Economic calendar with Live Activities for traders
description: Never miss market-moving events. Signal Station puts economic releases on your lock screen with Live Activities, community sentiment tracking, and smart alerts. Ideal for forex, stock, and cryptocurrency traders who need to stay ahead of volatility.

name: FlouState
tagline: Discover you only debug 1% of your time
description: Think you debug 50% of the time? Data shows it's 1%. Automatic work type tracking reveals where your coding time ACTUALLY goes—creating, debugging, refactoring, or exploring. Finally understand your real work patterns.

name: InterShipFlow
tagline: Shipmondo orders & shipment tracking directly in Intercom
description: Instantly view Shipmondo orders, shipments, and tracking info inside Intercom. No tab switching or manual lookups — just faster replies and happier customers. Perfect for e-commerce support teams using Intercom and Shipmondo.

name: Astra Trust Center
tagline: Show your security posture with confidence
description: Astra’s Trust Center is a customizable hub to showcase your real-time security posture. With AI-assisted creation, it makes it easy to build, maintain, and share security practices, certifications, and compliance updates.

name: AI Email Assistant By Jeeva AI
tagline: Your Inbox on Autopilot in 23 seconds
description: Jeeva's email assistant organizes your inbox, drafts replies in your tone, preps you for every meeting, joins you call and capture notes for you. So you get back 7.6+ hours of time back every week.

name: Monk
tagline: Turn Screen Time into Habit Time
description: Monk stops you right before you open distracting apps. Using science-backed methods of craving delay and habit stacking, it turns screen-time urges into mindful actions. Build better habits every time you reach for your phone.

name: PathCanary
tagline: 24/7 critical path monitoring & synthetic testing platform
description: Monitor any critical user journey with PathCanary. 24/7 synthetic monitoring for checkout flows, signup funnels, dashboards & key features. Self-hosted runners available. Anomaly detection, instant alerts, automated rollback. Catch failures before users notice

name: EasyVeo AI
tagline: Your Plug-and-Play Sora 2 App Builder
description: Clone, customize and launch your own AI Video Generator App—Sora 2 + Veo 3.1 + Nano Banana online. No invite codes, no watermarks. Type a prompt or upload an image, get cinematic or anime-style videos in minutes.

name: Nijta
tagline: Keep your sources safe, and your stories human.
description: Voice Harbor 4 is a next-gen voice anonymization tool that removes identity while keeping voices real. It preserves emotion, supports 4 languages, adapts across ages, and is built for journalists, editors & sound engineers who need authenticity and safety.

name: EasyCommerce
tagline: AI-Powered WordPress Ecommerce Plugin
description: EasyCommerce is an AI-powered ecommerce plugin for WordPress that lets you sell physical, digital, licensed, or subscription products with ease. Experience smart AI features, powerful addons, and lightning-fast performance, all with complete control.

name: Wender
tagline: The fastest AI design tool
description: Wender is the fastest way to design anything. Make prototypes, mockups, social media graphics, and presentations in seconds, not minutes. Every design is beautiful and fully customizable. Use the infinite canvas to copy and iterate endlessly.

name: Scorecard
tagline: Evaluate, Optimize, and Ship AI Agents
description: For teams building AI in high-stakes domains, Scorecard combines LLM evals, human feedback, and product signals to help agents learn and improve automatically, so that you can evaluate, optimize, and ship confidently.
